item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: KubeDL is written in the form of Kubernetes operator and use KubeBuilder for code scaffolding. Build the binary make manager Run the tests make test Generate manifests: CRD, RBAC YAML files etc make manifests Build the docker image export IMG=<your_image_name> && make docker-build Push the image docker push <your_image_name> Check the Makefile under github root directory for more details To develop/debug KubeDL controller manager locally, please check the debug guide.

item.title: How to Develop
How to Update
item.description: ðŸ’¡ Learn more about semantic versioning and advanced range syntax. Update npm packages Bump the versions in the devDependencies section of ./package.json to your liking, and run: npm update

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Problems updating npm packages Delete the ./node_modules folder, and run again: npm install Problems with cache Delete the temporary directories: npm run clean
